item.title: Scapy Snippets
item.description: How to get RSSI from WLAN packet from scapy.layers.dot11 import RadioTap, Dot11 def get_rssi(packet): if packet.haslayer(RadioTap): return packet.dbm_antsignal caveat: currently only tested on Ralink: RT5370 chipset
